FlowDefinition.description:
This flow allows a team admin to view a list of team members, select which members to remove, and then remove the selected members from the team. The flow clears the Business__c and Account_Code__c fields for the selected members and sends an email notification informing them of their removal.
V.11 - Added check for Admins, updating admin users with correct Profile, and changed delete PIMA records to update PIMA records.
